page.title: 16A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY.
page.content: {I live in a semi detached house {in Downs Way,East Preston.I have a { brother who is thirteen,a mum and {dad.My brother gets up at 6.30am to do {his paper round and my dad gets up at {that time.He is a carpenter and he {works at the Dell in Angmering where {a new housing estate is being built. {My mum who is a health care assistant {atthe Martlet's nursing home, works {from 10.pm until 8am.I usually have to {be dragged out of bed at about 7.55am. { After school I play football or {cricket then I watch T.V. till tea {time at about 6pm.We have salads,or {beefburgers or sausages and chips. { Sometimes I help wash up. { On Friday's my mum does the {weekly shopping at Key Markets in {near by Rustington which is a ten {minute drive. { }
